title: [Vigil's End, Legion Lane]
description: Smoke lingers in the air, thinly veiling clusters of charred homes with a grey haze.  Splintered wood boards up the windows, pale yellow light escaping from the cracks.  Threadbare banners adorn the eaves of a long slate-roofed house with a stone facade peaked by stepped gables.  Laden with decomposing burlap sacks, a toppled rickety cart sprawls before the porch, scattering rotten apricots across the mud-swept cobblestones.
